name: I bot you
description:
_________________________________________

CONTROLS

_________________________________________

Left stick to move

A to Interact

B to Kill

X to Infect

Windows only. Decompress the .zip file and run final.exe. Use Xbox controlers (up to 4).

Act like the bots in disguise; if you a re infected after interacting with the environment, your goal is to infect everyone else : THE REST OF THE PLAYERS MUST TRY TO KILL THE INFECTOR.

_______________________________________________
